diseases.name: Early Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark spots with concentric rings on older leaves, yellowing around affected areas
diseases.treatment: Use copper-based fungicides, remove infected leaves, ensure good air circulation
diseases.prevention: Crop rotation, avoid overhead irrigation, mulch soil to prevent spore splash

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems, fuzzy white growth under leaves, rapid plant collapse
diseases.treatment: Fungicide spray with mancozeb or chlorothalonil, remove affected plants immediately
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, avoid waterlogged conditions, improve ventilation

diseases.name: Septoria Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Small circular spots with dark borders and gray centers, tiny black dots in center
diseases.treatment: Prune infected leaves, apply copper or sulfur fungicides
diseases.prevention: Stake plants for air flow, avoid wetting foliage, sterilize tools

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked spots on leaves, white mold on undersides, brown rot in tubers
diseases.treatment: Remove infected plants, apply fungicides containing chlorothalonil or mancozeb
diseases.prevention: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering, ensure good drainage

diseases.name: Early Blight
diseases.symptoms: Small circular lesions with concentric rings on lower leaves
diseases.treatment: Remove lower leaves, apply fungicide at first sign of disease
diseases.prevention: Crop rotation, adequate spacing, avoid excess nitrogen

diseases.name: Black Scurf
diseases.symptoms: Black crust-like spots on tuber surface, doesn't affect flesh quality
diseases.treatment: Use certified disease-free seed potatoes, treat seed pieces with fungicide
diseases.prevention: Crop rotation, proper soil drainage, seed piece treatment

diseases.name: Leaf Blast
diseases.symptoms: Diamond-shaped lesions with gray center and brown border on leaves
diseases.treatment: Apply fungicides like tricyclazole, use resistant varieties
diseases.prevention: Avoid excessive nitrogen, balanced fertilization, good water management

diseases.name: Brown Spot
diseases.symptoms: Small circular to irregular brown spots with darker borders on leaves
diseases.prevention: Use certified seeds, proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen
